message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm open to discussing further if you have any thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'd like to get closer to the lower end of the price spectrum.
I understand your perspective, Bob. However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer.  I could consider coming down to $18,000. Would that be agreeable?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $18,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $14,000?
